Subject: Fire Detection System Alert

Dear [Recipient's Name],

I wanted to notify you that our fire detection system has been activated due to a fire incident. Please evacuate the premises immediately and follow all safety procedures. We have contacted the local fire department, who are responding to the situation. Your safety is our utmost priority, and we will keep you informed of any further developments. If you have any concerns or need assistance, please contact our designated point of contact at [Contact Number] or [Contact Email].

Stay safe,

[Your Name]
[Your Position/Title]
[Company Name]
